column4: can someone tell me if there's an app out there that can run my boot up my existing XP install kind of like Virtual Box, running within ubuntu?
can someone tell me if there's an app out there that can boot up my existing XP install kind of like Virtual Box, running it within Ubuntu?
i *believe* there's a tutorial on ubuntuforums.org about doing exactly that with virtual box or vmware but i'm not positive
